keikaku.reminder.title: To-Do List Reminder
keikaku.reminder.complete: All your tasks are complete. Do you want to add a new one?
keikaku.reminder.incomplete: There are unfinished tasks in your to-do list.
keikaku.reminder.hint: You can change when this dialog is shown in the module settings.
keikaku.settings.reminder.name: Remind Players
keikaku.settings.reminder.hint: During load a dialog pops up to remind players of the to-do list
keikaku.taskform.title: Edit Task
keikaku.todolistwindow.title: To-Do List
keikaku.todolistwindow.placeholder.owner: There's nothing for you to do at the moment. Add a task to get started.
keikaku.todolistwindow.placeholder.other: The selected player has not added any tasks.
